activities: Many of InnovoCommerce’s data systems are used by life science companies in the support of clinical trials. These data systems may contain identifiable information such as an investigator’s name, e-mail, phone number, or location. InnovoCommerce may also collect information through their website or through a marketing event for the purpose of sales, marketing, or technical support. In all cases such information is encrypted during transmission and stored securely within the clinical study database and is not made available to any party other than the sponsoring life science company.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: name, e-mail, phone number, and location
